about-text: My name is **Yaro Vennekens**, and I am a **22-year-old** living in the **province of Antwerp in Belgium**. Currently, I am pursuing my studies in the programming graduate program @ **Thomas More**. My passion for technology and software development drives me to **deepen my knowledge and skills**. Outside of school, I am a music enthusiast who enjoys attending concerts and festivals.
hero-text: I am a **programming student** at Thomas More in Geel. I thrive on turning creative concepts into reality through coding. I enjoy diving into various projects, exploring new technologies, and continuously learning while building exciting and functional solutions.
coding text: Here are some frameworks/languages I have been working with
